titleStmt.title: Don Sebastian, King of Portugal an historical novel in four parts / done out of French by Mr. Ferrand Spence.
Dom Sebastian, Roy de Portugal. English.
titleStmt.author: Spence, Ferrand.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Bentley and S. Magnes ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation by F. Spence of: Dom Sebastian, Roy de Portugal.

Reproduction of original in British Library.
